Terracotta Army
Ritual
F1E1
spell id [id]: 898
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 2134
spec [spec]: 8388608

Summon Units:#2134 Terracotta Soldier x 10+
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster crafts an army of terracotta soldiers and imbues them with false life. Terracotta Soldiers are highly resistant to fire, but are somewhat brittle if struck by blunt weapons.
